Player History
Injured on 9/5/1965 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for entire career...
Drafted in 3rd round, 44th overall pick, by Detroit in 1975...
Injured on 8/21/1978 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 4/12/1979 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 8/3/1979 with a Stiff Knee, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/14/1980, off Don Demola (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/9/1981, off Lary Sorensen (TEX)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1982, hitting .550 with 0 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/28/1983 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Had 25-game hitting streak snapped on 9/10/1984...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/2/1986 to a 5-year deal worth $8,254,000 per year...
Injured on 6/27/1986 with a Ruptured Medial Collateral Ligament, out for entire career...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
